ValidationRule.description: [ZRM] Validación para mostrar un error al Agente Mediador si selecciona algún valor no permitido para ellos
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( $Profile.Name = "Agente Ventas" || $Profile.Name = "Agente Ventas - AGR" ) && ( ClonedOfferForIntermediary__c = false || ( ClonedOfferForIntermediary__c = true && ISCHANGED(Sales_Loss_Reason__c) ) ) && ( ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Interested, managed by my agent") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Not Zurich customer") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"No Recording Accepted") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Unreachable After Hours") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Maximum Attempts") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Robinson List") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"No cooperation") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Interested contact agent") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Error") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Not managed by the Agent") || ISPICKVAL(Sales_Loss_Reason__c,"Campaign completed") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: [VR Oferta] El valor de Motivo de Pérdida seleccionado no es válido
